title: Root-vegetable Gratin
summary: Root-vegetable Gratin is a gluten free recipe with 18 servings. This side dish has 252 calories, 9g of protein, and 14g of fat per serving. For $1.14 per serving, this recipe covers 16% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 53 minutes. Head to the store and pick up beets, yukon gold potatoes, parsnips, and a few other things to make it today. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 63%. This score is good. Similar recipes include Root Vegetable Au Gratin, Root-Vegetable Gratin, and Root Vegetable Gratin.
